segments.text: The children’s excitement fills the kitchen, but it also makes me anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Every time the boy reaches into the cookie jar, my breath catches.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s just cookies, but it feels like the stakes are much higher in this moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks up at him with such hope and anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their little scheme is innocent yet fraught with danger; I can hardly watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman’s indifference to the scene around her only adds to my frustration.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, it’s as if the world continues to spin without a care, while chaos reigns indoors.
segments.speaker: PAR
